message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DB. 

This paper is about relation extraction, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category. The paper also proposes a joint inference framework that employs global clues to resolve disagreements among local predictions, which involves machine learning and optimization techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely categories as well. The paper also mentions the use of knowledge bases, which suggests that cs.DB (Databases) could be a relevant category. Finally, the paper involves the analysis of experimental results, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
